testcase.classname: Validate the functionality of Add New Policy
testcase.name: CoreFlex - Verify behavior of ClientID field for Valid data

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Fail :: Failed to verify Policy Name Dropdown field for valid ClientID. expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:94) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:496) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:42) at stepDefinitions.coreFlex.CoreFlex_AddNewPolicy_Steps.policy_Name_dropdown_list_should_be_displayed_having_all_the_policies_tied_to_entered_Client_ID_Name(CoreFlex_AddNewPolicy_Steps.java:67) at ✽.Then 'Policy Name' dropdown list should be displayed having all the policies tied to entered 924 Client ID/Name(coreFlex/CoreFlex_AddNewPolicy.feature:10)

testcase.failure:
Given he has logged into 'Aires Policy Tool' application as a "Client Service Manager" user.passed Given he has navigated to "Add New Policy Form" menu from left navigation of 'Aires Policy Tool' homepage.passed When he enters valid 924 in 'Client ID' dropdown list.......................passed Then 'Policy Name' dropdown list should be displayed having all the policies tied to entered 924 Client ID/Name.failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: Fail :: Failed to verify Policy Name Dropdown field for valid ClientID. expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:94) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:496) at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:42) at stepDefinitions.coreFlex.CoreFlex_AddNewPolicy_Steps.policy_Name_dropdown_list_should_be_displayed_having_all_the_policies_tied_to_entered_Client_ID_Name(CoreFlex_AddNewPolicy_Steps.java:67) at ✽.Then 'Policy Name' dropdown list should be displayed having all the policies tied to entered 924 Client ID/Name(coreFlex/CoreFlex_AddNewPolicy.feature:10)

testcase.classname: Validate the functionality of Add New Policy
testcase.name: CoreFlex - Verify behavior of ClientID field for Invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given he has logged into 'Aires Policy Tool' application as a "Client Service Manager" user.passed Given he has navigated to "Add New Policy Form" menu from left navigation of 'Aires Policy Tool' homepage.passed When he enters invalid 123 in 'Client ID' dropdown list.....................passed Then 'No items found' text should be displayed in dropdown list followed by 'Record does not exist' Error popup for Invalid 123.passed And 'Policy Name' dropdown list should not be displayed for Invalid 123.....passed

testcase.classname: Validate the functionality of Add New Policy
testcase.name: CoreFlex - Verify user is navigated to 'General Information' page after clicking on Next button
testcase.system-out: Given he has logged into 'Aires Policy Tool' application as a "Client Service Manager" user.passed Given he has navigated to "Add New Policy Form" menu from left navigation of 'Aires Policy Tool' homepage.passed And he has entered a valid "49211" in 'Client ID' dropdown list.............passed And he has selected a policy from 'Policy Name' dropdown list...............passed When he clicks on 'Next' button.............................................passed Then user should be navigated to the "General Information" page of the selected Client Policy.passed
